body.p:
Dis Nos
Louisville Feby 23d 1864
Dear Sir,

We need another Magistrate in Barren County, in lieu of Wert Owen deceased, I think there is a statute authorizing me to appoint a magistrate in his place -- until the next regular election, I wish you would Commission William Hamilton he is a good Union man has been so all the time.

I understand Col Graham of would like to command a regiment in Ky. no man would be more popular in our part of the state, he was in command at our place for sometime, I think he could come there and raise a regiment.
Well I will not pester to you further than to say if you will give me the appointment to go to Washington City, to attend to Ky. claim I think I can attend to the business correctly, and would do so.

Barren Co
J. P.
Wm Hamilton
Apptd
4th Mar 1864
